changelog: Added boss locations with hosted items for boss events.
Tweak Kraid Speed Booster logic to inherit Kraid logic status.
Some behind-the-scenes work on locations.json generator project.
Added map only variant for spectating.
Updated unknown item display behaviour depending on options.
Some refactoring.
Fixed a minor logic issue where Space Jump wasn't being checked properly for Chozodia Ruins Test Area checks.
Added up-to-date logic as of v0.2.2 of the apworld.
Added images for each option.
Added scoutability logic to some locations (all areas except Chozodia).
Added minor out-of-logic indicators to show post-Kraid and post-Ridley locations are accessible if they can be beaten out of logic.
Added two new layouts: items on left and items only.
General design and polish pass of all layouts.
Added automatic tab switching based on area.
Added support for options, and autoloading of options on connect.
Added event tracking to show when bosses are defeated.
Updated individual area maps to have a cleaner look.
Improved combined map layout, and added visual indicators for how zones connect.
Added 'peeks', which are little squares near connectors to other areas, that show all of the checks in those areas.
Added broadcast view (thanks David!).
Removed duplicated location names (thanks again, David!).
Logic hasn't yet been updated, that will come in the next update.
Initial release!
